response.overview: This is from the same film crew and riders who brought us the 18 minute film called "Endurome" back in 2011. The cinematography was done by Jakub Klawikowski and Daniel Skrzyniarz from ASF Studio and features Polish brand Kross mountain bikes.  Michael Jasiński, Marketing Manager for Kross explains, "Over 9 months took to prepare, a new Kross supported video called "Path Finder" Film presents the trip of old enduro stagers, Mariusz Bryja and Tomek Dębiec who visited wildest and most epic places in European mountains like Polish Bieszczady, Romania, Bosnia and Herzegovina or Croatia. Enjoy!"  The film is a real treat and the quality, scenery and riding are top notch! Eat lunch at your desk today and watch the whole thing!
response.title: Path Finder
